body.name: ORFELD Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 500W/40Kpa Stick Vacuum with Self-Standing, Max 60Mins Runtime, Vacuum Cleaners for Home with LED Display, 6 in 1 Cordless Vacuum for Carpet Hardwood Floor Pet Hair
features: 🧐[Uncover the Best Cordless Vacuum Solution]➠Tired of lackluster suction, frequent recharging, and spending a fortune on different vacuum cleaners? ORFELD V16 PRO cordless vacuum cleaner is here to revolutionize your cleaning experience

🌀[40Kpa Powerful Suction for Efficient Cleaning]➠ORFELD cordless vacuum boasts a 500W motor for a mighty 40,000Pa suction force. Say goodbye to tiny particles, pet hair, and debris on carpets, hardwood floors, and tiles. Experience a level of cleanliness you've never seen before.

⏱[Max 60Mins Runtime & Detachable Battery]➠Our vacuum cleaners for home is Equipped with high-capacity, detachable batteries, our stick vacuum cleans up to 35% longer. Covering a 2,500 sq ft area on a single charge is no longer a dream. Plus, the detachable battery design allows for convenient individual charging.

⚓[Hands-Free Convenience with Self-Standing Design]➠Our V16 PRO cordless stick vacuum cleaner features a self-standing function, enabling you to place it anywhere, anytime. No need to find a corner to prop it up when you have other tasks. V16 PRO stick vacuum cleaner is your silent cleaning assistant, ready to go.

🧷[Effortless Hair Management with Anti-Tangle Brush]➠Our cordless vacuum cleaner comes with an upgraded V-shaped anti-tangle rolling brush, effectively reducing hair entanglement. The brush head offers remarkable flexibility, moving 0° to 180° sideways and 0° to 90° up and down, along with bright LED lights for better corner cleaning.

📟[Smart LED Display & 5-Stage High-Efficiency Filtration]➠Keep an eye on your cleaning progress with the smart display, which shows battery power, dust cup fullness, brush clogs, and suction modes in real-time. Our vacuum cleaners adopt a five-cone dust and air separation device, effectively capturing 99.9% of small dust particles and releasing purified air.

🤵[Dedicated After-Sales Support]➠At ORFELD, we are dedicated to product quality and committed to providing the best products and services. Should you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We guarantee to resolve your issue within 24 hours. Plus, if you need accessories, we're just a message away. We're always here to assist you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new little friend!
reviews.reviewText: *did not receive a free anything for this review*Contrary to the comments of one poster who is claiming that positive reviews are not genuine.Just received this today, so obviously long term performance is as yet undetermined. That said, so far, I'm impressed.My first thought when using it was that someone actually cared about the design and ease of use. I want to mention that this comes with instructions that actually make sense.I used this on tile floors, luxury vinyl floors and a bit of carpet. I was impressed.Battery : Held up nicely with excellent power throughout entire use.Charging:You'll see 1,2,3 on the top of the battery, and depending on how much of a charge is needed, you will see one of those numbers blinking as it is in the charging process.I definitely appreciate that there is no guesswork in determining how long the battery needs to be charged.Disconnecting and connecting the battery couldn't be easier, it has a drop in slot at the top, where with the push of the button the battery can slide in or out as needed.Is it heavy?I found this vacuum to be very easy to handle, not heavy, but not so lightweight that it didn't feel substantial. Does it fall over?Vacuum stands on its own without sliding to the floor or tipping over. Another design feature that makes using this vacuum a pleasure.How is the suction? Suction was excellent. You will notice there are three settings for suction, each one did its job and I have to note that the noise level was excellent, far less than a stick vacuum I had had several years ago, which sounded like a rocket launch.Can I adjust the height?Yes it adjusts easily. This was an unexpected but welcomed feature.Does it clog ? At no point in my vacuuming did I encounter any clogs. The tubing seems to be pretty wide and allowed for debris to flow easily into the waste cup.And this was impressive considering the amount of crud that was under our couch.It vacuumed all of it easily, and nothing clogged.How do you empty it? With the touch of a button. No struggling.I love that I didn't have to remove the cup from the stick. This vacuum allows you to simply press a button to open the bottom of the cup directly over your garbage can.Yet another example of thoughtful design.I imagine in the coming months I'll probably add to this review to address durability.I cannot honestly note any negatives and can only say that this absolutely has exceeded my expectations.Before making this purchase, I looked at reviews of a number of top stick vacuums both corded and uncorded. I read consumer sites, retail sites, I read everything. And the funny thing was none of those expensive top of the line brands, with their super high price tags seemed to offer what this could for a fraction of the cost.Bottom line: Excellent product and I'm glad that I bought it.Jan 2024 update: Still delighted with this Orfeld!In fact, I purchased another for my 94 yr old parents, who live independently & still want to do as much as they can manage, themselves. Excellent for any solid surface floor & cleanups on carpet. They love it!Feb 2024: this little Orfeld is still a delight to use. One of the best purchases we've ever made!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The V16 Pro is an Excellent Vacuum Cleaner
reviews.reviewText: This is my second cordless vacuum cleaner. The V16 Pro is the latest Orfeld model in 2023. It has all three features that I require in a cordless vacuum. It is self standing, has a removable battery, and LED lights to show what you’re vacuuming. The V16 Pro also has a telescoping pole, which I find very useful. It picks up everything quite well. The floor brush doesn’t swivel much, but that doesn’t lessen its effectiveness.The real benefit of the V16 Pro is that it has an advanced filtration system that emits purified air back into the room. That’s a characteristic of far more expensive cordless vacuum cleaners. The dirt canister is small but it traps all the dirt and dust in it. I have used the vacuum three times and the round black pre filter and HEPA filter above the canister have remained clean despite doing the entire house. That’s a sign that the filtration system is doing a great job.An extra HEPA filter is included with the V16 Pro. If you want to order extra HEPA filters, do an Amazon search on “Orfeld B08 Filter.” That filter is identical to the one in the V16 Pro and fits perfectly. I ordered a four pack and those filters match the supplied HEPA filters exactly.The large battery seems like it will last a long time. I sent an email to Orfeld tech support asking if this battery is in stock and can be ordered, but haven’t heard back yet. The LED display on the battery shows the three power selections for the vacuum. It’s quite helpful and easy to read while vacuuming.The other LED display shows the battery level in percentages, and gives warnings when the floor brush is tangled or the canister is full. That’s something more expensive cordless vacuums don’t offer.All in all, the Orfeld V16 Pro is the latest model in 2023 and offers enough suction power. It only weighs 6.4 pounds and is light enough so that my back and arm don’t ache after I have finished vacuuming the entire house, even under the beds. The V16 Pro offers everything the higher priced models do and has several useful features that they don’t offer. I think the V16 Pro is a good value for the money and I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for small home or quick cleanups
reviews.reviewText: It is too small to be the only vacuuming source in the house unless you have a small place or you’re just looking to do a quick cleanup of a few rooms or area, but it is an excellent little vacuum. I think the only reason I only gave it 4 stars is because of the battery life.It is very compact, super easy to use & swivels easily once you get the hang of it.When you turn it on the default speed is always 2 (has 3 speeds), I used it on this speed (2) once I fully charged the battery & it only lasts 15 minutes. I use it daily & it is always the same.The company sent me another battery & once fully charged I used it on speed 1 & the maximum you can get out of the charge is 25 minutes. It does great a picking up at all speeds, I’m using it on hardwood floors & small rugs.I love that all attachments can be rinsed off & that if anything gets stuck ( in my case, tape) you can simply starts detaching parts with a simple touch of a button & you can see & remove the blocked object, even the base of it can be rinsed off with ease, just as with any vacuum, the hairs need to be removed, a little tool is included for this.I have been using it for a month on a daily basis & I am impressed at how much it picks up every single day in a home with just two of us! I can’t wait to see what the battery life will be.I do recommend & love this product .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful and lite.
reviews.reviewText: I've used the vacuum for about a week now, and it's performed well. Good suction and battery life. It dies an exceptional job with pulling in debris that close to a wall and I very much like the swivel brush head. It's lite and comfortable in my hand. For the price, I'd recommend it.
